title: Letters from Poland
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Emigration and immigration
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Social isolation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social isolation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Culture conflict
description: The story of a young Polish immigrant and her struggle to build a new life in the harsh environment of post World War II Sydney. The film raises a number of themes: the loneliness of being in a foreign land; the special isolation of a migrant woman and the dislocation of a single mother needing to support both herself and her child. Cast includes Bashia Bonkowski, Martin Vaughan, Jessica O'Donnell, Arthur Krawczynski, Tracy Ellis. Photography: Martha Ansara
